OpenSim::OpenSimUserForces

OpenSimUserForces Class Reference

#include <OpenSimUserForces.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A class for applying forces accumulated in OpenSim to an underlying Simbody multibody system.

The accumulated forces are obtained from the SimbodyEngine class.

Authors:
Frank C. Anderson
Version:
1.0
